definition: Carnegie (name)/Andrew Carnegie (1835-1919), Scots American steel millionaire and philanthropist
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

pinyin: Ka3 nei4 ji1 Mei2 long2 Da4 xue2

sentences.english: The keys to success were that Carnegie Mellon gaudio-videoe us the reins.
sentences.chinese: 我们告成的关键是卡内基梅隆大学放手让我们去干。

sentences.english: JapanNYC is the latest Carnegie effort dedicated to a major theme.
sentences.chinese: 卡内基最近一段时间都致力于日本纽约文化节。

sentences.english: But soon Carnegie was seen practicing public speaking on the riverside.
sentences.chinese: 但是很快人们又看到卡内基在河边练习演讲了。
海丁利卡内基馆，利兹，英国。

sentences.english: Uri Dadush is the director of Carnegie's International Economics Program.
sentences.chinese: Uri达杜什是卡内基国际经济项目主任。

sentences.english: Larry Wasserman is Professor of Statistics at Carnegie Mellon University.
sentences.chinese: 拉里瓦瑟曼是统计学教授在卡内基梅隆大学。

sentences.english: Dmitry Trenin is director of the Carnegie Moscow Center.
sentences.chinese: 特伦宁是卡内基莫斯科中心的负责人。

sentences.english: The cause was metastasized pancreatic cancer, Carnegie Mellon University announced.
sentences.chinese: 卡内基梅隆大学讣告中说蓝迪死于胰腺癌扩散。

sentences.english: Randy the brilliant, charming, Carnegie educated CS professor.
sentences.chinese: 兰迪聪慧，迷人，卡内基毕业的计算机学教授。

sentences.english: He said Carnegie was investigating a way to steer charitable donations.
sentences.chinese: 他说卡内基正在研究一种方法来带动慈善捐款。

sentences.english: She's making her New York debut at Carnegie Hall.
sentences.chinese: 卡内基音乐堂举行她在纽约的首次演出。

sentences.english: Carnegie tutorials, software, college students must have.
sentences.chinese: 卡内基教程，软件学院学生必备。

sentences.english: The main hall at Carnegie seats roughly 2, 800.
sentences.chinese: 卡内基音乐大厅约有2800个座位。

sentences.english: Carnegie tried to be more active in college. He joined the debate team.
sentences.chinese: 卡内基开始积极参加大学活动，他参加了辩论队。

sentences.english: Which of the following best characterizes how Carnegie managed his business?
sentences.chinese: 下面何者最能用来说明卡内基经营事业的特色？

pinyin: Pu3 lin2 si1 dun4 Da4 xue2

definition: Paulson or Powellson (name)/Henry (Hank) Paulson (1946-), US banker, US Treasury Secretary from 2006
California Institute of Technology (Caltech)/abbr. for 加利福尼亞理工學院|加利福尼亚理工学院
pinyin: Jia1 zhou1 Li3 gong1 Xue2 yuan4
